    • Field Detail

      • LOG

        private static final org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger LOG
        Quick note about RakNet protocol versions: If the RakNet protocol version for Minecraft is ever bumped, please let me know immediately. I would add a function to change the network protocol values, however I would rather have myself change it after being notified by someone through an issue on GitHub so I know the protocol is possibly out of date and that I need to bump the versions.

    • Method Detail

      • getMaxPacketsPerSecond

        public static long getMaxPacketsPerSecond()
        Returns how many packets can be received in the span of a single second (1000 milliseconds) before a session is blocked.
        Returns:
        how many packets can be received in the span of a single second before a session is blocked.

      • setMaxPacketsPerSecond

        public static void setMaxPacketsPerSecond(long maxPacketsPerSecond)
        Sets how many packets can be received in the span of a single second (1000 milliseconds) before a session is blocked.
        Parameters:
        maxPacketsPerSecond - how many packets can be received in the span of a single second before a session is blocked.

      • setMaxPacketsPerSecondUnlimited

        public static void setMaxPacketsPerSecondUnlimited()
        Removes the max packets per second limit so that no matter how many packets a session sends it will never be blocked. This is unrecommended, as it can open your server to DOS/DDOS attacks.

      • getMaximumTransferUnit

        public static int getMaximumTransferUnit()
        Used to determine the maximum transfer unit of the device. Normally, the maximum transfer unit that will be used is the one of the network interface that is bound to localhost. However, if it is not possible to fetch the network interface with the localhost address, the lowest valid maximum transfer unit of the device will be used instead.
        Returns:
        the maximum transfer unit of the device.

      • createBootstrapAndSend

        private static RakNetPacket createBootstrapAndSend(java.net.InetSocketAddress address,
                                                   Packet packet,
                                                   long timeout,
                                                   int retries)
        Sends a raw message to the address for the amount of times in the interval until the packet is received or there is a timeout.
        Parameters:
        address - the address to send the packet to.
        packet - the packet to send.
        timeout - the interval of which the packet is sent.
        retries - how many times the packet will be sent.
        Returns:
        the received packet if it was received.
